name: chesstempoviewer
description: Build process for ChessTempoViewer WordPress plugin

scripts.build: npm run clean && mkdirp dist && rsync -av --exclude=node_modules --exclude=dist --exclude="package*.json" --exclude=.gitignore --exclude="screenshot-*.*" --exclude=.idea ./ dist/
scripts.package: npm run build && npm run zip

author: Your Name
